title: Dolphins surprise the Ravens, OBJ to the Rams, Nate Burleson on Cam Newton and OBJ, Super Bowl Champ Andre Rison and Pigskin Picks!
itunes:title: Dolphins surprise the Ravens, OBJ to the Rams, Nate Burleson on Cam Newton and OBJ, Super Bowl Champ Andre Rison and Pigskin Picks!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Nick Mangold discuss the Dolphins surprise upset over the Ravens and Tua Tagovailoa playing while injured. WR Odell Beckham Jr. is headed to the Rams and the crew explains why it's a good fit. Nate Burleson drops by to discuss Cam Newton returning to the Panthers and why he would get in a ring with Mike Tyson. Kay gives her top Fantasy Football picks and we get thoughts on all the top matchups coming in NFL Week 10. Super Bowl Champion WR Andre Rison comments on the Falcons and Chiefs plus a special Pigskin Pick for the 2nd Grade Crimson Tide.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
